 1998-21491998-12-030,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisEnactment of an EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER FOR CERTAIN FORMER MANAGEMENT TRAINEES AND CERTAIN POSITIONS - which exempts 18 participants in the Management Trainee Program from the application of specific provisions of the Public Service Employment Act upon their assignment to positions in the federal Public Service in the MANAGEMENT TRAINEE CATEGORY (MM-03).
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0124 Publication Date: 1998-12-23
